TITLE North African Spiced Shrimp and Chickpea Salad

{[Chermoula]

# Combine and blend until smooth: [1 cup cilantro], [1/2 cup mint], Pinch of [red pepper flakes], [1 cloves garlic], [1 tsp Ras el Hanout], [1/4 cup olive oil], [1 tbl lemon juice].

}

{[Chickpea Salad]

# In a bowl combine:{[15 oz chickpeas [rinsed]] [1 cup grape tomatoes [,quartered]] [1 cup [peeled, seeded and diced] cucumber] [1/8 cup [diced] shallot] [2 tbl mint[, chiffonade]] [2 tbl [chopped] parsley] [2 tsp olive oil] [1 tsp red wine vinegar] [1 dash Ras el Hanout]}
# Season with [salt] and [pepper].
# Drizzle with [olive oil] and [vinegar].
}

{[Shrimp]
# In a dish combine:{[1 lbs extra-large shrimp] [1.5 tsp $[Chermoula]] [1 dash Ras el Hanout]}
# Toss to coat.
# Grill
}
# Plate $[Chickpea Salad], top with $[Shrimp], drizzle with $[Chermoula]. Serve.
